channel.title: Decisions and Verdicts on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Decisions and Verdicts on PepsFeeder

item.title: Chiquita Held Liable for Deaths During Colombian Civil War
item.description: A federal judge in Florida has ruled that Chiquita Brands International, the world’s largest banana company, is liable for the deaths of four Colombian union leaders who were assassinated during the country’s civil war.

item.title: After Trump’s Conviction, a Wary World Waits for the Fallout
item.description: The verdict in the impeachment trial of former President Donald J. Trump was a foregone conclusion. The question now is what it means for the United States and the world.
